verses.kjv: He that dwelleth in the secret place of the most High shall abide under the shadow of the Almighty.
verses.ct: Whoever lives in the shelter of the Most High will rest in the protection of the Almighty.

verses.kjv: I will say of the LORD, He is my refuge and my fortress: my God; in him will I trust.
verses.ct: I will declare about the LORD, "He is my safe place and my stronghold — my God, the one I put my trust in."

verses.kjv: Surely he shall deliver thee from the snare of the fowler, and from the noisome pestilence.
verses.ct: He will certainly rescue you from hidden traps and from deadly disease.

verses.kjv: He shall cover thee with his feathers, and under his wings shalt thou trust: his truth shall be thy shield and buckler.
verses.ct: He will shelter you with his wings, and under them you will find safety. His faithfulness will be your shield and armor.

verses.kjv: Thou shalt not be afraid for the terror by night; nor for the arrow that flieth by day;
verses.ct: You won't need to dread the dangers that come at night or the attacks that fly toward you during the day.

verses.kjv: Nor for the pestilence that walketh in darkness; nor for the destruction that wasteth at noonday.
verses.ct: You won't need to dread the plague that creeps through the darkness or the disaster that strikes at noon.

verses.kjv: A thousand shall fall at thy side, and ten thousand at thy right hand; but it shall not come nigh thee.
verses.ct: Even if 1,000 fall beside you and 10,000 collapse at your right side, none of it will come near you.

verses.kjv: Only with thine eyes shalt thou behold and see the reward of the wicked.
verses.ct: You will simply watch with your own eyes and witness the punishment of the wicked.

verses.kjv: Because thou hast made the LORD, which is my refuge, even the most High, thy habitation;
verses.ct: Because you have made the LORD your home — the Most High, who is my safe place —

verses.kjv: There shall no evil befall thee, neither shall any plague come nigh thy dwelling.
verses.ct: no harm will reach you, and no plague will come near where you live.

verses.kjv: For he shall give his angels charge over thee, to keep thee in all thy ways.
verses.ct: He will command his angels to watch over you and guard you wherever you go.

verses.kjv: They shall bear thee up in their hands, lest thou dash thy foot against a stone.
verses.ct: They will lift you up in their hands so that you won't even stub your foot on a stone.

verses.kjv: Thou shalt tread upon the lion and adder: the young lion and the dragon shalt thou trample under feet.
verses.ct: You will walk right over lions and venomous snakes; you will trample fierce lions and serpents underfoot.

verses.kjv: Because he hath set his love upon me, therefore will I deliver him: I will set him on high, because he hath known my name.
verses.ct: "Because he holds on to me with love, I will rescue him. I will place him in a position of honor because he has known my name.

verses.kjv: He shall call upon me, and I will answer him: I will be with him in trouble; I will deliver him, and honour him.
verses.ct: When he calls out to me, I will respond. I will stand with him in hard times; I will rescue him and give him honor.

verses.kjv: With long life will I satisfy him, and shew him my salvation.
verses.ct: I will give him a full, long life and let him experience my salvation."
